summary: Maxwell outfit recolored to brown or black. UNP.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][size=4][b]About:[/b][/size][/color]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=3]FILE TYPE IS REPLACER[/size]

This was a request to make the outfit more skyrim friendly. The original was fine but a bit modern so it was colored to brown, more specifically a brown to match the leathers in the game (as shown in one of the pics). Also tweaked the textures around a bit.

Sorry guys I don\'t dabble in the CK all that much so it\'s not really fully added to the game. In order to acquire this piece do the following:

1 - [coc qasmoke] in the console.
2 - Buy it by merchant
3 - [coc Riverwood] in the console.

This version is not standalone and will overwrite the original :(. This is only for UNP unless someone makes it for CBBE.

[color=green][size=4][b]Other Downloads:[/b][/size][/color]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14668]Original Maxwell by Anano[/url]

[color=blue][size=4][b]Thanks:[/b][/size][/color]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Thanks goes out to Anano for making the clothing and being a bro and supplying the PSD files, makes my job so much easier ;).

[color=Yellow][size=4][b]My Armor Recolors:[/b][/size][/color]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12534]R18Pn 01 - Eisen Platte Armor for UNP CBBEv3 ReColor-STEEL[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14055]R18Pn 04 - Ritter Armor for UNP CBBEv3 ReColor-STEEL[/url]
author: Anano - CluelessClue
